lines.text:
[singing]
Betty, you cunnin' little Boop-a-dooper; / Betty, you won my heart. / Betty, you knock me for a loop-de-looper; / Betty, each time you start / Betty, it's time that we went steady; / Let's get ready for the wedding. / Betty, perhaps you'll boop-a-boop / a lullaby to a Betty bye and bye.

[singing]
Made of pen and ink, / She can win you with a wink / Ain't she cute?

[to Betty]
Mmm, not bad. What can you do?
